text: Márta Antal-Rudas (14 February 1937 – 6 June 2017) was a Hungarian javelin thrower. She competed at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Olympics and finished in ninth, second and fourth place. She was born in Debrecen, Hungary. Antal-Rudas died on 6 June 2017 in Budapest, Hungary at the age of 80.Elhunyt Rudasné Antal Márta ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Hungarian athletes Category:Javelin throwers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary
title: Márta Antal-Rudas
